review: It is a great media device. Streams videos well with very little buffering. However, If amazon wants to compete in the casual/hardcore gaming space they either need to up the storage space or allow additional storage media through USB to install data onto. Even though the unit has a 8GB drive to store your apps on, only 5GB is available. Some games can take up 2-3gb of Data. Which uses the available 5GB of storage very quickly. Meaning you can only put one or 2 games on the device at a time with little space for anything else. Loss of 2 stars because of this. It is very important to not only have powerful hardware but to also have or allow for additional storage.
